title: Volcanic eruptions - people affected worldwide up to 2016
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Location and Date, and Number of victims in each Location and Date on the y axis.
Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has the highest Number of victims and Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) has the lowest Number of victims.

Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) has 7.55 times less Number of victims than Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) which is the highest.

Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has the highest Number of victims and Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) has the lowest Number of victims.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Location and Date, and Number of victims in each Location and Date on the y axis.
Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has the highest Number of victims and Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) has the lowest Number of victims.
Location and Date Volcano eruption in Ecuador (August 14 2015) has the second highest value for Number of victims.

The highest Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has 898925.0 more Number of victims than the lowest Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).

The Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has the highest Number of victims, followed by Volcano eruption in Ecuador (August 14 2015), and Volcanic eruption in Nicaragua (April 9 1992). Down to the Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) which is the lowest.
The Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) tends to be 2.81 percent higher than average.
The Number of victims is 3685304.0 if we add up values of all Location and Dates.

data.Location and Date: Volcanic eruption in Papua New Guinea (September 19 1994)
